meanings.definition: Make as large or great as possible.
meanings.sent1: She maximises her savings by putting money into a piggy bank every day.
meanings.sent2: The farmer maximises his crop yield by using the best fertilizers.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel maximises its acorn collection by storing them in multiple hiding spots.
meanings.sent4: The sun maximises its warmth by shining brightly in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The student maximises her study time by creating a detailed schedule.

meanings.definition: Make the best or most effective use of.
meanings.sent1: He maximises his time by prioritizing important tasks first.
meanings.sent2: The chef maximises the flavor of the dish by using fresh ingredients.
meanings.sent3: The cat maximises its nap time by finding the coziest spot in the house.
meanings.sent4: The athlete maximises her performance by following a strict training regimen.
meanings.sent5: The teacher maximises student engagement by incorporating interactive activities in the lesson.
